divs: sighting detailsi was standing outside looking west when a bright yellow orange sphere appeared and went straight west to east maybe a mile high moving at about 4 times the speed of jets i normally see. as it went over it faded out and was a tiny dot much higher than it started and disappeared. i called my wife out to see it and she did not recognize it either. there was no sound or trail.it would have taken 1\2 a pencil eraser to cover it up. my thought was it could be the iss but i dont know where it is in orbit.
Summary: Bright yellow orange sphere west to east solid yellow orange fast moving
